casebody.data:
Hardin PRUITT, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 15107. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 14, 1954. Hardin D. Pruitt, in pro. per. Charles L. Short, Asst. U. S. Atty., Malcolm R. Wilkey, U. S. Atty., Houston, Tex., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and HOLMES, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

On the grounds and for the reasons stated in its opinion, 121 F.Supp. 15, the judgment of the District Court is Affirmed.
